caption.p: Effect of an antiviral treatment on viral dynamics according to the timing of treatment initiation (left: day 0, middle: day 3; right: day 5) and the level antiviral effectiveness. Top: Model including an innate immune response (Eq. 3); bottom: target cell limited model (Eq. 2) according to the timing of treatment initiation. The following parameter values were used to generate these curves: T 0 = 10 9 cell/mL; c = 22/day, p = 1,000 virions/cell/day; V 0 = 10 −4 virions/mL, δ = 2/day, ϕ = 0.3 mL/pg/day, d = 1/day, q = 100 pg/cell/day, R 0 = 6, and θ = 200 pg/mL. In the target cell limited model, q was set to 0.
